channel.title: attack.t1046 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1046 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Advanced Port Scanner
item.description: Detects the use of Advanced Port Scanner.

item.title: Python Initiated Connection
item.description: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of services running on remote hosts, including those that may be vulnerable to remote software exploitation

item.title: Suspicious Nmap Execution
item.description: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of services running on remote hosts, including those that may be vulnerable to remote software exploitation

item.title: Advanced IP Scanner
item.description: Detects the use of Advanced IP Scanner. Seems to be a popular tool for ransomware groups.

item.title: Linux Network Service Scanning
item.description: Detects enumeration of local or remote network services.

item.title: MacOS Network Service Scanning
item.description: Detects enumeration of local or remote network services.

item.title: Network Scans Count By Destination IP
item.description: Detects many failed connection attempts to different ports or hosts

item.title: Network Scans Count By Destination Port
item.description: Detects many failed connection attempts to different ports or hosts
